mapper.select: SELECT I.REPORT_TITLE, W.WEEK_NUM, I.REPORT_START_DATE, I.REPORT_END_DATE, I.REPORT_CONTENT, I.REPORT_FILE_CODE, I.REPORT_CODE, RS.REPORT_SUBMISSION_OPTION FROM REPORT_INFO I JOIN COURSE_WEEKLY W ON I.WEEK_CODE = W.WEEK_CODE JOIN REPORT_SUBMISSION RS ON RS.REPORT_CODE = I.REPORT_CODE WHERE RS.REPORT_CODE = #{reportCode} AND RS.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId}

SELECT I.REPORT_TITLE, W.WEEK_NUM, I.REPORT_START_DATE, I.REPORT_END_DATE, I.REPORT_CONTENT, I.REPORT_FILE_CODE, I.REPORT_CODE, RS.REPORT_SUBMISSION_OPTION, RF.REPORT_FILE_CODE AS REPORT_SUB_FILE_CODE, RF.REPORT_FILE_NAME, RF.USER_CODE FROM REPORT_INFO I JOIN COURSE_WEEKLY W ON I.WEEK_CODE = W.WEEK_CODE JOIN REPORT_SUBMISSION RS ON RS.REPORT_CODE = I.REPORT_CODE JOIN REPORT_FILE RF ON RS.report_FILE_cODE = RF.REPORT_FILE_CODE WHERE RS.REPORT_CODE = #{reportCode} AND RS.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId}

select rf.report_file_path from report_info ri join report_submission rs ON ri.report_code = rs.report_code join report_file rf ON rs.report_file_code = rf.report_file_code where rs.student_id = #{studentId} and rf.report_file_code = #{reportSubFileCode}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO report_file ( report_file_code, report_file_name, report_file_stored_name, report_file_extension, report_file_path, user_code, submit_id ) VALUES ( 'RPF'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(report_file_seq.NEXTVAL), 17, '0'), #{reportFileName}, #{reportFileStoredName}, #{reportFileExtension}, #{reportFilePath}, #{userCode}, #{submitId} )
SELECT MAX(report_file_code) FROM report_file
mapper.select: SELECT S.STUDENT_GRADE, S.STUDENT_ID, P.STUDENT_NAME FROM STUDENT_STUDY_INFO S JOIN STUDENT_PRI_INFO P ON S.STUDENT_ID = P.STUDENT_ID WHERE S.STUDENT_ID = #{value}

select c.week_num, s.report_score, s.report_submission_code, rf.* from report_info i join report_submission s ON s.report_code = i.report_code join course_weekly c ON c.week_code = i.week_code join report_file rf ON s.report_file_code = rf.report_file_code where i.report_code = #{reportCode} and s.student_id = #{studentId}
